docs.snippet: Andy Murray saved seven match points before beating Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-7 (4), 7-6 (18), 6-1 to reach the Dubai Tennis Championships semifinals on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andy Murray saved seven match points before beating Philipp Kohlschreiber 6-7 (4), 7-6 (18), 6-1 to reach the Dubai Tennis Championships semifinals on Thursday.

headline.main: Murray Survives Seven Match Points in Dubai Quarterfinals

docs.snippet: Morgan Stanley economists said on Thursday they expected the Federal Reserve will raise U.S. interest rates by a quarter point to a range of 0.75-1.00 percent at its upcoming policy meeting in less than two weeks....

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Sees Fed Hiking U.S. Rates in March

docs.snippet: Britain's MI6 spy agency will go back to its old, informal "tap on the shoulder" method of hiring new agents in a bid to find more black and Asian recruits....

docs.snippet: At least 57 members of the al-Shabab extremist group were killed Thursday as African Union and Somali forces attacked one of its camps, the AU peacekeeping mission in Somalia announced. It was one of the deadliest assaults on the al-Qaida-linked g...
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 57 members of the al-Shabab extremist group were killed Thursday as African Union and Somali forces attacked one of its camps, the AU peacekeeping mission in Somalia announced. It was one of the deadliest assaults on the al-Qaida-linked group by the joint forces.

headline.main: At Least 57 Al-Shabab Extremists Killed in Somalia Assault
headline.print_headline: At Least 57 Al-Shabab Extremists Killed in Somalia Assault

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Thursday dismissed claims by the U.S. government that Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton fraudulently duped wealthy investors before taking office, giving the Republican a key victory two months ahead of his criminal trial that c...
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Thursday dismissed claims by the U.S. government that Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton fraudulently duped wealthy investors before taking office, giving the Republican a key victory two months ahead of his criminal trial that carries a possible prison sentence.

headline.main: Federal Judge Tosses SEC Suit Against Texas Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Tosses SEC Suit Against Texas Attorney General
